article.title: VSolvit to Support Naval Facilities IT Center
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: VSolvit L.L.C., Fillmore, Calif., is being awarded a $10,527,041 indefinite-delivery/ indefinite-quantity contract with firm-fixed-price task orders for information technology enterprise business systems support at Naval Facilities (NAVFAC) Information Technology Center, Naval Base Ventura County. The contract also contains four unexercised options, which if exercised would increase cumulative contract value to $53,121,508. No task orders are being awarded at this time. The Naval Facilities Engineering and Expeditionary Warfare Center, Port Hueneme, Calif., is the contracting activity.
